From One Thing to Something Else (2015) {#from-one-thing-to-something-else-2015 .entry-title}

::: {.entry-content} is a jointly written and performed text with Julieta Aguinaco and Ben Burtenshaw for ’To Make a Work, Molecular Revolutions’: workshop, seminar and exhibition. Curated by Grant Watson and Yael Davids and organised by the Dutch Art Institute. Performed at Casa do Povo, São Paulo, Brazil.

[SCRIPT From One Thing to Something Else]{style=”line-height: 1.6471;”} :::
